name: N-hydroxy-L-tyrosine,[reduced NADPH-hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
definition: N-Hydroxy-L-tyrosine + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> N,N-Dihydroxy-L-tyrosine + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: first step of two-step reaction (R04460+R07190 or R06585), subsequently R07190 and second step of three-step reaction (see R10671, R00730+R04460+R07190)
